Crunchy Quick Refrigerator Dill Pickles


Ingredients
8 salad or pickling cucumbers
2 garlic cloves
5 sprigs fresh dill
1/2 teaspoon peppercorns
4 cups water
3 tablespoons kosher salt
3/4 cup white vinegar

Cooking Instructions

Place half of cucumber slices in a large jar. Add garlic,
dill, and peppercorns. Top with remaining cucumbers until
the jar is filled tightly. Bring water, salt, and vinegar to
a boil in a small saucepan, stirring occasionally, until
salt is dissolved. Remove from heat and let cool 10 minutes.
Pour warm mixture over cucumbers and seal jar. Refrigerate
at least one day and up to 4 weeks.
